addText.text: Dear participant, Welcome to our study! We are a company called Flying Fish Research-Neurosketch, which performs research for companies. Here, we are interested in understanding how people like different beer bottle designs. We will ask you questions about different new beers. Your participation is very important to us. Please press ' Continue'.
When stimuli are loaded (bottom bar), please click 'Continue'
please tell us your Prolific Academic participant ID

addButton.if: this.click?this.text='If you wish to take part you need to provide your ID',this.click&&required==true?nextTrial.start()

addComboBox.label: What country do you come from?

addInput.text: What is your native language ? - Please answer writing in this space.

addText.text: In each trial you are asked to drag pictures of bottles of beer, or words, into a grey box, arranging those items as instructed. There are 11 such trials in total.
Please arrange these words according to how well you think each befits the brand name {b}Malagüero{/b}.
What does {b}Malagüero{/b} mean in English? Please do not use a dictionary.

not at all---very much;not at all well---very well;hard to read---easy to read;not at all---very much;not at all---very;not at all---very;not at all---very;dry---smooth;light---strong;cheapest on the market---most expensive on the market
Please arrange the beers you see next according to
addText.text1: how much you {b}like{/b} each.;how well you think each would sell.;how easy it is to read the beer brand on each.;whether the bottle design is suitable for a beer.;how {b}sweet{/b} you think each would be.;how {b}sour{/b} you think each would be.;how {b}bitter{/b} you think each would be.;how {b}dry/smooth{/b} you think each would be.;how {b}light/strong{/b} you think each would be.;how {b}expensive{/b} you think each would be.

addButton.if.spanish: this.click?this.text='ubique todas las imagenes por favor'

addText.text: Thank you for your participation. We are testing different beer bottle designs on a number of attributes. If you have questions and would like to learn more about this investigation, please contact Alejandro Salgado alejandro.salgado@psy.oc.ac.uk. Don't forget to visit the below site to tell Profilic Academic you have completed the study.---{a href='https://prolificacademic.co.uk/submissions/55ab5adbfdf99b2dced04115/complete?cc=TB6DYR7P'}https://prolificacademic.co.uk/submissions/55ab5adbfdf99b2dced04115/complete?cc=TB6DYR7P{/a}.
